thread.title: quake vs doom vs prey mod - screen shots

post.author: mavrik65
post.body:
here is a couple of screens from my up coming mod for quake 4, tell me what you think and enjoy.

http://img143.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 631le3.bmp
http://img135.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 257yj2.bmp
http://img292.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 888jl3.bmp
http://img257.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 762lk9.bmp
http://img301.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 365pz0.bmp
http://img291.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 620gt6.bmp
http://img219.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 188cd8.bmp
http://img292.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 988yx3.bmp
http://img230.imageshack.us/my.php?imag ... 717lo8.png
http://img134.imageshack.us/my.php?image=10pf4.png

post.author: pbmax
post.body:
distributing such a mod would be illegal.

good job porting over all the prey and doom assets though.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
there's a thread on the legality of the mod somewhere...

but... that last pic is awesome.

post.author: Phobos
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
there's a thread on the legality of the mod somewhere...

but... that last pic is awesome.

post.author: =NoMercy=
post.body:
It should be required that when installing the mod you have to have all the games, and port the models manually. (but have step by step instructions).


Looks awsome, good job.

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: I understand everyone's concern but since there's a thread dedicated to legal discussion specifically about this mod let's try and keep the discussion here relevant to the screenshots posted.

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
Ha! this is awesome!

<edit> but uploading BMPs is lame!

post.author: Moth
post.body: Aaargh!! Bitmaps!! They burn!!!! Aaarrgh!!

post.author: mavrik65
post.body:
Brain Trepaning wrote:
Ha! this is awesome!

<edit> but uploading BMPs is lame!


why is uploading bitmaps lame?

post.author: Ivan_the_B
post.body: Probably because BMP is not compressed...use JPG next time

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
mavrik65 wrote:
why is uploading bitmaps lame?


bmp = huge uncompressed.

But it doesn't matter... the png's are 1.5mb too, so in this case it's no bandwidth saved.

post.author: mavrik65
post.body: i'll use jpg next time
